title: Requires all-way stop signs erected at all intersections immediately surrounding a public or private school in a city with a population of 1 million or more
summary: Requires all-way stop signs erected at all intersections immediately surrounding a public or private school in a city with a population of 1 million or more.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring all-way stop signs erected at all intersections immediately surrounding a public or private school
